title: Pause/Play
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is playing a video
custom_steps:
WHEN a user presses the [X] button on the controller once
AND presses the [X] button a second time
custom_expected:
THEN the scrubber displays
AND the video pauses after the first button press
AND the screen displays a pause icon in the center of the screen for 1 second
AND the video plays after the second button press
AND the screen displays a play icon in the center of the screen for 1 second

title: Tap Fast Forward
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is playing a video
AND the scrubber is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the right d-pad button, R2 button, or the left analog stick to the right
custom_expected:
THEN FF is engaged at speed 2x 
AND for every tap, the FF speed increments 4x, 8x, 16x, 32x, 64x, 128x, 256x
AND the playback marker moves along the scrubber corresponding to the speed of FF
AND video is paused while FF is engaged

title: Tap Rewind
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is playing a video
AND the scrubber is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the left d-pad button, L2 button, or the left analog stick to the left, multiple times
custom_expected:
THEN RW is engaged at speed 2x
AND for every tap, the RW speed increments 4x, 8x, 16x, 32x, 64x, 128x, 256x
AND the playback marker moves along the scrubber corresponding to the speed of RW
AND video is paused while RW is engaged

title: Slow down Fast Forward
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is fast forwarding a video
AND the fast forward speed is 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, or 256
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the left d-pad button, L2 button, or the left analog stick to the left
custom_expected: THEN the fast forward speed decreases by one increment for every tap

title: Slow down Rewind
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is rewinding a video
AND the rewind speed is 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, or 256
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the right d-pad button, R2 button, or the left analog stick to the right
custom_expected: THEN the rewind speed decreases by one increment for every tap

title: Stop Fast Forward
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a video is playing
AND Fast Forward has been initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the [X] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN Fast Forward is stopped
AND the playback head moves to the timestamp corresponding to when the [X] button was pressed
AND the video begins playback at the playback head position

title: Stop Rewind
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a video is playing
AND Rewind has been initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the [X] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN Rewind is stopped
AND the playback head moves to the timestamp corresponding to when the [X] button was pressed
AND the video begins playback at the playback head position

title: Cancel Fast Forward
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a video is playing
AND Fast Forward has been initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN Fast Forward is stopped
AND the playback head moves back to the position before Fast Forward was initiated
AND the video begins playback at the playback head position

title: Cancel Rewind
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a video is playing
AND Rewind has been initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN Rewind is stopped
AND the playback head moves back to the position before Rewind was initiated
AND the video begins playback at the playback head position

title: Toggle CC On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Closed Captions are turned "Off" on the Settings page
AND the user is entitled to live/archive game video playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the CC button in the scrubber
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captioning displays during video playback
AND the Closed Captioning value on the Settings page displays "On"

title: Toggle CC Off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Closed Captions are turned "On" on the Settings page
AND the user is entitled to live/archive game video playback
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the CC button in the scrubber
custom_expected:
THEN Closed Captioning does not display during video playback
AND the Closed Captioning value on the Settings page displays "Off"

title: Video playback during app pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a subscriber is playing a video stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses and holds the [PS] button on the controller to bring them back to the Playstation home screen
custom_expected:
THEN the video is paused
AND the app is dismissed
AND the user is on the Playstation home screen
AND when the user opens the app again, the video displays paused at the playback point from when the app was paused
AND the user can start playback from the paused point

title: Video playback during app close
custom_preconds: GIVEN a subscriber is playing a video stream
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses and holds the [PS] button on the controller to bring them back to the Playstation home screen
AND presses the [Options] button on the controller
AND selects "Close App" from the menu
AND the user opens the app again
custom_expected:
THEN the Home page is displayed
AND "Today's Games" are displayed on the Games carousel
AND a the user is able to resume the stream at the point when the [PS] button was pressed

title: Video Error during playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled to a live feed or an archive feed
AND the user is playing a live feed or archive feed
custom_steps:
WHEN a video error is encountered during playback

**NOTE:** Block network requests during video playback.
PROD request url: vod-akc-ewr1.media.mlb.com/ (this may be for archive streams only)
QA request url: hlslive-akc-ewr1-qa.media.mlb.com/
DAI Ads: dai.google.com
custom_expected:
THEN a "Video Error" modal displays
AND the MLB logo and text is displayed center justified at the top of the screen
AND "Video Error" displays above "Please try again later." centered in the screen
AND an [Go Back] button is displayed with focus
AND the user is navigated back to the previous page after selecting the [Go Back] button

title: Video Error at playback start
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled to a live feed or an archive feed
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a feed to watch
AND a video error is encountered at playback start

NOTE: Block network requests before video playback starts.
PROD request url: vod-akc-ewr1.media.mlb.com/ (this may be for archive streams only)
QA request url: hlslive-akc-ewr1-qa.media.mlb.com/
DAI Ads: dai.google.com
custom_expected:
THEN a "Video Error" modal displays
AND the MLB logo and text is displayed center justified at the top of the screen
AND "Video Error" displays above "Please try again later." centered in the screen
AND a [Go Back] button is displayed with focus
AND the user is navigated back to the Previous page after selecting the [Go Back] button

title: Stream Error - non-blackout error non-video error
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled to a video stream
custom_steps:
WHEN an error occurs at the start of, or during video playback
AND the error is not a Blackout Error or a Video Error

**NOTE:** Best way to trigger this type of error is to start playback of an archive game from the beginning. Initiate FF for a few seconds, initiate playback again, then immediately after initiating playback again, initiate FF again. A spinning baseball should appear and after ~30 seconds the video error modal should trigger.
custom_expected:
THEN the "Video Error" modal displays
AND the text "Please try again later." displays
AND the user cannot dismiss the modal by pressing the [O]/CIRCLE button on the controller
AND the user is navigated to the Games page after selecting the [Go Home] button
AND focus is assigned to the previously selected game tile

title: mediaInfo called when scrubber is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled to live game playback
AND the user is in the MLB experience

**NOTE:** should be tested on a browser. Search network calls for "graphql". "mediaInfo" is one of the graphql calls.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user displays the scrubber
AND keeps the scrubber displaying for at least 2 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN mediaInfo is called when the scrubber displays
AND mediaInfo is called every 90 seconds while the scrubber displays

title: mediaInfo is not called when the scrubber is not displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled to live game playback
AND the user is in the MLB experience

**NOTE:** should be tested on a browser. Search network calls for "graphql". "mediaInfo" is one of the graphql calls.
custom_steps:
WHEN playback of a live game is initiated
AND live playback continues without the scrubber displaying
custom_expected:
THEN mediaInfo is called when the live game feed is launched
AND mediaInfo is not called while the scrubber is not displaying

title: Exit Live Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user selects a live game to watch
AND the video plays for several minutes
AND the scrubber is not displaying
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the live game video is stopped
AND the video player is dismissed
AND the user is navigated back to the previous page

title: Play live game from live point
custom_preconds: GIVEN a live game is in-progress
custom_steps:
WHEN a subscriber selects a live game to watch
AND the user selects the [Watch Live] button in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN the video player fills the screen
AND a spinning baseball is displayed while the video is loading
AND the live game starts playing from the live point
AND the scrubber displays
AND the scrubber disappears after 10 seconds of inactivity

title: Watch Live inning markers - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers ON
AND a game is in-progress
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects an in-progress game to watch from the live point
custom_expected:
THEN the user begins watching at the live point
AND inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar to the left of the playhead as the innings begin
AND as half innings begin, inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar
AND an upward pointing triangle indicates top of the inning
AND a downward pointing triangle indicates bottom of the inning
AND a number indicates the inning

title: Watch Live inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers OFF
AND a game is in-progress
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects an in-progress game to watch from the live point
custom_expected:
THEN the user begins watching at the live point
AND inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar to the left of the playhead as the innings begin
AND as half innings begin, inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar
AND an upward pointing triangle indicates top of the inning
AND a downward pointing triangle indicates bottom of the inning
AND a number indicates the inning

title: Watch from the beginning live game inning markers - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers ON
AND an in-progress game has started
AND the live point is after the top of the first inning
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the in-progress game to watch from the beginning
custom_expected:
THEN the user starts watching the game from the broadcast start point
AND inning markers are not populated to the right of the playback head
AND as the half innings begin, inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar, to the left of the playback head

title: Watch from the beginning live game inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers OFF
AND an in-progress game has started
AND the live point is after the top of the first inning
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the in-progress game to watch from the beginning
custom_expected:
THEN the user begins watching at the beginning
AND inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar to the right of the playhead
AND as half innings begin, inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar
AND an upward pointing triangle indicates top of the inning
AND a downward pointing triangle indicates bottom of the inning
AND a number indicates the inning

title: Resume live game inning markers - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers ON
AND a user has exited an in-progress live game
custom_steps: WHEN a user resumes an in-progress live game
custom_expected:
THEN the video starts playing from the bookmarked point
AND inning markers display in the scrubber, to the left of the playback head, for the portion of the game the user has already watched
AND as the half innings begin, inning markers are populated in the scrubber bar
AND inning markers are not populated between the users watch point and the live point, to the right of the playback head

title: Resume live game inning markers - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Hide Spoilers OFF
AND a user has previously exited an in-progress live game
custom_steps: WHEN a user resumes the in-progress game
custom_expected:
THEN the video starts playing from the bookmarked point
AND inning markers display in the scrubber, to the left of the playback head, for the portion of the game the user has already watched
AND inning markers are populated between the users watch point and the live point, to the right of the playback head

title: End of live game stream
custom_preconds: GIVEN an in-progress game is playing from the live point
custom_steps: WHEN the stream ends
custom_expected:
THEN the video player is dismissed
AND the user is navigated back to the previous page

title: Live Playback Wired Connection
custom_preconds: GIVEN a users PlayStation is connected to the internet using a wired connection
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a live game to watch
custom_expected: THEN the selected live game starts playing

title: Live Playback Wireless Connection
custom_preconds: GIVEN a users PlayStation is connected to the internet using a wireless connection
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a live game to watch
custom_expected: THEN the selected live game starts playing

title: Rewind to live stream start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is playing a live game
AND the stream has been playing for some time
custom_steps:
WHEN a user initiates rewind
AND the user does not stop rewind
custom_expected:
THEN the playhead rewinds to the beginning of the stream
AND rewind stops automatically at the beginning of the stream
AND the stream starts playing from the beginning
AND the scrubber bar is auto dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Fast forward to live stream live point
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is playing a live game
AND the playhead is not at the live point
custom_steps:
WHEN a user initiates Fast forward
AND the user does not stop fast forward
custom_expected:
THEN the playhead fast forwards to the live point
AND fast forward stops automatically at the live point
AND the stream starts playing from the live point
AND the Live indicator is red
AND the Jump to Live button is not displayed
AND the scrubber bar is auto dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Anonymous user cannot watch live games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an anonymous user has launched the app
AND a live game is in progress
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a live game to watch
custom_expected: THEN the live game does not playback

title: User is able to watch subsequent live games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is playing a live game
custom_steps:
WHEN a user exits a live game
AND a user selects a subsequent live game to watch
custom_expected: THEN the subsequent live game plays successfully

title: Jump to Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is playing a live stream
AND playback is behind the live point
custom_steps:
WHEN the user displays the scrubber
AND the user selects the "Jump to Live" button
custom_expected:
THEN the video jumps playback to the live point
AND the Live indicator in the scrubber is red
AND the scrubber playback head increases in size indicating it has focus

title: Complete game playback
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
custom_steps:
WHEN a user initiates playback of a live game before the first pitch
AND the user watches the entire game to the end of the stream
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to watch a complete game
AND the user does not experience any errors during playback that require the user to restart the app

title: Hero - Live game playback - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a live game is present in the Hero
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
custom_steps: When a user selects "Watch Live" from the Hero/featured content space
custom_expected: THEN playback should launch at the live point

title: Hero - Live game playback - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a live game is present in the Hero
AND Hide Spoilers is set to ON

When a user has Hide Spoilers ON and clicks Watch Now from the featured content space, playback should launch at the beginning of the stream
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects "Watch Now" from the Hero/featured content space
custom_expected:
THEN playback should launch at the beginning of the stream

**NOTE:** if the game is in progress and the live point is after the first pitch, the beginning of the stream will be the broadcast start point before the first pitch. Timecode will not be 00:00. If live point it before the first pitch, the beginning of the stream will be the beginning of the stream. Timecode will be 00:00.

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Video Feed - Paid Subscriber non-Single Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not anonymous, a free user, or a single team subscriber
AND the user is entitled to live game playback
AND the user is not blacked out from game playback
AND the user has initiated playback for a game that has home and away feeds
custom_steps:
WHEN the user displays the scrubber
AND assigns focus to "Broadcast Options"
AND navigates to the video feed button that is not blue
AND presses the CROSS/X button
custom_expected:
THEN the newly selected video feed starts playing back
AND audio playback is updated to the TV audio of the newly selected video feed
AND the scrubber is dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Video Feed - FGoTD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user
AND the user is not blacked out of a Free Game of the Day
AND the user has initiated playback for a live Free Game of the Day
custom_steps:
WHEN the user displays the scrubber
AND assigns focus to "Broadcast Options"
AND navigates to the video feed button that is not blue
AND presses the CROSS/X button
custom_expected:
THEN the newly selected video feed starts playing back
AND audio playback is updated to the TV audio of the newly selected video feed
AND the scrubber is dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Broadcast Options - Cannot Switch Video Feed - Single Team Subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a Single Team subscriber
AND the user is not blacked out of a live game
AND the user has initiated live playback of a video feed for which they are entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has opened the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects the video feed for the team which they are not subscribed
custom_expected:
THEN a modal with a "Content Not Entitled" message is displayed with an "Okay" button
AND the subscribed team feed continues playing in the background

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Video Feed - Resume Switched-To Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user is not blacked out of the selected live game
AND the selected live game has home and away video feeds
AND the user initiates live playback of the home team video feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects the away team video feed
AND lets the away team feed play for at-least several moments
AND the user backs out of game playback
AND the user resumes the away team video feed from the feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN video playback resumes at the bookmarked point
AND the TV audio for the associated video feed is playing back
AND the audio is in-sync with the video

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Video Feed - Resume Switched-From Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user is not blacked out of the selected live game
AND the selected live game has home and away video feeds
AND the user initiates live playback of the home team video feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects the away team video feed
AND lets the away team feed play for at-least several moments
AND the user backs out of game playback
AND the user resumes the home team video feed from the feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN video playback resumes at the point from where video feeds were switched
AND the TV audio for the associated video feed is playing back
AND the audio is in-sync with the video

title: Broadcast Options - Cannot Switch Video Feed - Single Team Subscriber - Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a Single Team subscriber
AND the user is not blacked out of a live game
AND the user has initiated live playback of a video feed for which they are entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects the video feed for the team which they are not subscribed
AND the user selects the "Okay" button on the "Content Not Entitled"
custom_expected:
THEN the "Content Not Entitled" modal is dismissed
AND the subscribed team feed continues playing
AND focus is assigned to the video feed button for which they are not entitled
AND the scrubber is dismissed after 10 seconds

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Alt Audio - Paid Subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user is not blacked out of a live game
AND the user has initiated playback of a live game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options
AND the user selects a non-TV audio feed
custom_expected:
THEN the newly selected audio feed begins playback
AND the audio feed is in-sync with the video feed
AND the scrubber is dismissed

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Alt Audio - FGoTD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user
AND a live Free Game of the Day is not blacked out
AND the user has initiated playback of a live Free Game of the Day
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options
AND the user selects a non-TV audio feed
custom_expected:
THEN the newly selected audio feed begins playback
AND the audio feed is in-sync with the video feed
AND the scrubber is dismissed

title: Broadcast Options - Switch Alt Audio - Resume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user is not blacked out of the selected live game
AND the selected game has alt audio feeds
AND the user selects a video feed to initiate live playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Broadcast Options in the scrubber
AND the user selects an alt audio feed
AND lets the game continue playing back for at-least several moments
AND the user backs out of game playback
AND the user resumes the same video feed from the feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN video playback resumes at the bookmarked point
AND the alt audio feed that was selected before backing out is playing back
AND the alt audio is in-sync with the video

title: Broadcast Options - Reset Alt Audio - Start from the Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND the user is entitled for live game playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a live game for playback
AND selects an alt audio feed in the Broadcast Options
AND dismisses playback
AND selects the same feed again, from the feed select modal
AND selects "Start from the Beginning" in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the broadcast start point
AND the TV audio feed is highlighted in blue, in Broadcast Options
AND the TV audio plays back and is synced with the video feed

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user is in the MLB experience
AND the user is entitled to live game playback
AND live game playback is initiated
custom_steps: WHEN a user initiates the scrubber bar to display
custom_expected: THEN "Details" is the furthest left position below the scrubber bar

title: Game Details - Watch Live Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in

AND the user is entitled to live game playback
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
AND playback is initiated at the Live Point
custom_steps:

AND the user assigns focus to the Details tab below the scrubber bar

AND each teams total runs is displayed below "R"
AND each teams total hits is displayed below "H"
AND each teams total errors is displayed below "E"
AND as the game progresses, Runs, Hits, and Errors are updated as they happen

AND after focus is reassigned to the playback head, the scrubber bar increases in width/thickness (up and down)
AND the scrubber bard doesn't move its position up or down
AND the elements above the scrubber do not move/adjust up or down, regardless of scrubber focus state
AND the elements below the scrubber do not move/adjust up or down, regardless of scrubber focus state

title: Broadcast Options - UI - Home/Away Feeds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the feature flag for Broadcast Options is set to true (environments: dev, qa, beta)
AND the logged in user is in the MLB experience
AND the logged in user is entitled for game playback
AND the user has initiated playback of a Live or Archive game
AND the scrubber is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the down arrow
custom_expected:
THEN focus is assigned to [Broadcast Options], text is black with a white background
AND "Video Feed" is displayed below Broadcast Options, left justified
AND the home video feed with team logo and broadcaster name is displayed below "Video Feed"
AND the away video feed with team logo and broadcaster name is displayed below the home video feed
AND "Audio Feed" is displayed to the right of "Video Feed"
AND the audio feeds associated with the selected video feed/team are displayed below the "Audio Feed" heading
AND Audio buttons display the team logo followed by "TV" (for TV audio), "ES" (if Spanish), then broadcast name
AND the selected feed buttons have a blue background
AND focus is indicated with a white button background
AND unfocused/unselected buttons will have a white border with a transparent background
AND the scrubber bar shrinks in vertical size
AND the quick action buttons above the scrubber bar are hidden
AND the the game metadata/title is hidden

**NOTE:** 
If more than 2 audio options are available, they will display in a grid with 2 per column
If a broadcast name is too long to fit in the button, an ellipsis will display on the right side of the button

title: Broadcast Options - UI - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled for game playback
AND the user has initiated playback of a Live or Archive game
AND the scrubber is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN focus is on the Broadcast Options menu
custom_expected:
THEN pressing down or 'X' will move focus to the first available video option
AND pressing right' or 'left will move focus to the corresponding option on the right or left
AND pressing right after reaching the right most option in the list will not move focus
AND pressing left after reaching the left most option in the list will not move focus
AND pressing down' or 'up will move focus to the corresponding option below or above
AND pressing down after reaching the bottom most option in the list will not move focus
AND if focus is on the top most tile of any column, pressing Up will return focus to Broadcast Options

title: Scrubber bar - Live game before broadcast start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in the MLB experience
AND a video feed for a game is MEDIA_ON
AND a broadcast start milestone has not been set
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Start From The Beginning" in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the feed
AND the playback head is at the far left of the scrubber bar
AND "Event Will Begin Shortly" slate is displayed
AND the time below the scrubber is 00:00:00
AND if the user FF 1/4 of the way in the scrubber, the "Event Will Begin Shortly" slate is displayed

title: Scrubber bar - Live game after broadcast start
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in the MLB experience
AND a video feed for a game is MEDIA_ON
AND a broadcast start milestone has been set
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Start From The Beginning" in the secondary feed select modal
custom_expected:

AND the playback head is at the far left of the scrubber bar
AND the time below the scrubber is 00:00:00
AND the user cannot RW to the start of the feed

title: RW Pill - Archive - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Hide Spoilers is OFF
AND a user is playing an archive game
custom_steps: WHEN the user engages rewind
custom_expected:
THEN the video is paused
AND the scrubber displays
AND a pill displays centered above the playhead
AND the pill contains the away team logo on the left side of the pill
AND the pill contains the home team logo on the right side of the pill
AND the respective score is displayed in the center of the pill
AND above the pill the elapsed time at the playhead will display
AND below the scrubber bar the RW multiplier is displayed with two arrows pointing the the left
AND the inning at the playhead is displayed to the right of RW arrows
AND the number of outs at the playhead is displayed to the right of the inning
